quote: Because I know you live on the hope of seeing a better tomorrow, unlike the skeptics who have nothing to live for today. I would rather die with hope, than to live without any hope at all.
quote_letters: BECAUSE I KNOW YOU LIVE ON THE HOPE OF SEEING A BETTER TOMORROW UNLIKE THE SKEPTICS WHO HAVE NOTHING TO LIVE FOR TODAY I WOULD RATHER DIE WITH HOPE THAN TO LIVE WITHOUT ANY HOPE AT ALL
